segments.text: Thank you for joining us this evening at Chez Attitude .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am Mr . Foster , and we have a 7:00 dinner reservation tonight for four people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Welcome , Mr . Foster , if you would have a seat in the lounge area , our hostess will be ready to seat you in just a moment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are going to have a drink while we are waiting . Please let the hostess know that she can find us there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She will come and let you know when your table is prepared .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Those patio tables are new , aren't they ? Would it be possible to be seated out there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: An outside table is available right now if you would like to be seated immediately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We would love to sit outside . Thanks for your help !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is your table , and now may I take your drink order while you are considering what to have for dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , could you please bring us a pitcher of margaritas and four glasses while we are figuring out our dinner order ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll put your drink order in and be right back to get your dinner order .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll be ready to order by the time you get back !
segments.speaker: S2
